This sweatshirt is very nice. Heavy weight material to help keep you warm. Not typical sweatshirt material, the inside is not fuzzy.  Washes well and regular drying cycle.
Love the 90s style from my childhood. Baggy but not took much so. Ordered my normal size and very comfortable.

Truly love this sweatshirt it is so soft on the inside on the outside. It doesn’t itch perfect length for wearing leggings. The colors are very bright just overall a really good looking and feeling sweater.

评论概述: Cute but long for a petite person

Colors were bright which I like however- it was very long for my short torso but if you're into that look I say go for it. (Most young people are but I'm not) I'm going to return it but I'm still going to give it a 5 star because it was very cute and well made!
I wear with jeans and love how it fits!!

This is the perfect pullover for autumn. It's pretty lightweight so you won't get too hot, but it will keep you warm on the cooler days. I also like the style of it. It would probably be great for a freddy kreuger costume.

More of a towel/robe type of texture. Not the soft kind. It was cute in person. Just didn’t like it on me.

This is a cute, comfortable oversized crew neck that is very easy to wear. The sizing on the chart is true and the fit was exactly as I expected. Colors are just as shown and I haven't had any problems with them bleeding.
The top smelled a little like chemicals when it arrived, but after one wash it was gone. This sweater is so cute & a good dupe for the FP one!

Wore this for church and got so many compliments! It’s bright, fun, comfy and cute! Will be wearing it all year round! Might grab a couple other colors too!

I returned because it was just okay. It just looked like a regular striped sweatshirt. No exciting details and it wasn’t oversized. Size up if you want the model’s look. It wasn’t rough but wasn’t too soft either. It had a decent weight to it. The quality was decent, and for the $15 sale price is worth it, but I had ordered other better options.
Trend that I fell for. I thought the fit would be oversized, but it’s not, it runs a bit small. It’s very thin & scratchy. Not very warm. Not worth the money or hype.

I like to have fun casual clothes and this really fit the bill! It's soft and comfortable. The weight is perfect--not too heavy. Hopefully the quality stands the test of time, but so far it is a very nice addition to my wardrobe.
Love this sweatshirt. True to size and so comfortable! I want to order in more colors for the fall!
Wanted to love this but the sleeves are way too short especially compared to the oversize fit of the sweatshirt. Returned

Very please with quality and fit.  It’s oversized and great length!

I got this because it looked just like a FP sweater I've been seeing. I like it. It's not knitted or anything, just very basic thin material. I was nervous about the stripes but was pleasantly surprised. It washes well and looks adorable with white jean shorts. This thing went everywhere with me this summer! I usually wear Medium and this fit was perfect.

Cute sweatshirt and very popular right now. The quality is great and the colors are true to the picture. I feel size is accurate. The material is a sort of jersey on the outside, towels on the inside, which makes it warm, but not hot. Overall a pretty good sweathshirt.

We bought this for our oldest daughter as she wants only very comfortable and cute clothing. It works for her. She looks cute and she’s happy. She said the material is light and doesn’t make her sweat. It’s great quality and didn’t shrink in the dryer!
I saw this top on 7 different women on my Alaska Cruise. Still 🩷
Fits true to size. It’s so flattering and wonderful quality. I will definitely be getting a couple more in other colors!

I recently purchased this oversized striped sweatshirt, and I couldn't be happier with my choice! This piece combines comfort with a playful aesthetic, making it a perfect addition to my wardrobe.  The fun color palette is truly a standout feature. The vibrant stripes in shades of teal, pink, and yellow create a lively look that instantly brightens up any outfit. Whether paired with jeans for a casual day out or leggings for a cozy night in, this sweatshirt adds a touch of fun to my style.  The oversized fit is incredibly comfortable, allowing for easy movement while still looking trendy. The fabric is soft and warm, making it perfect for chilly days. I also appreciate the ribbed cuffs and hem, which help to keep the shape intact even after multiple washes.  Overall, this oversized striped sweatshirt is a fantastic blend of style and comfort. If you're looking to add a pop of color and a cozy layer to your wardrobe, I highly recommend giving this one a try!
I am looking forward to cool weather so I can wear this. The colors are bright, it’s comfortable and great quality.
Feels rough and it’s too light to keep warm but too heavy to wear outside if it’s in the 70’s, hoping it works better in the fall. Not a fan of the texture so definitely won’t buy more or again.
Love this top! Cute with jeans shorts or a denim skirt
Pleasantly surprised on the thickness and quality of this sweatshirt. Was expecting a thin material, but this exceeds my expectations! Love the color combos! Fits as expected-a bit oversized.
Looks good
I didn’t like the fabric. It wasn’t soft and it was itchy on me. It also wasn’t as oversized as I expected.
The sleeves are very short on this shirt. It’s so cute but not made portioned.
I love the quality., the weight, the fit, and the colours. No shrinkage that u could tell, it's warm and soooo comfortable.  I wear it all the time.
Looks great and it’s soft
The blue is the perfect shade and the material feels like good thick quality.

评论概述: Oversized, comfy and exactly as advertised
评论详情: Love this sweatshirt! It’s not a super soft material like the usual Amazon polyester material, it’s a little rougher but I honestly love that about it. It’s perfectly oversized, not tight anywhere and is so cute. Very happy with this piece
Made well…love this sweatshirt! Goes well with everything.
Love the feel and it's a perfect fit, in my regular size.
Trendy sweatshirt

I absolutely love this crewneck sweatshirt!! It looks great and it's made of high-quality fabric. It's one of those kinds of fabrics that don't pill and wash well!! I am very pleased with the quality and the colors of this shirt and I've already worn it numerous times. It's especially great for an airconditioned room in the summer!
The colors are brilliant and the shirt is lightweight but a bit scratchy

It’s a cute oversized shirt, but the color doesn’t really seem brown. I don’t mind the burgundy colored stripes, but I would have preferred a more true brown. Either way, the shirt is good for running errands or working at home. While it’s lightweight, you still feel like you’re in a supportive, comfy material. Obviously pairs well with leggings and yoga pants, and maybe jeans.

I ordered this in two colors and this one came next day which is cool. The colors look just like the photo. It’s heavier weight than I was expecting for the price. The inside is kind of a terry cloth and the sleeve cuffs and collar are a thicker cotton. It has a drop shoulder and slouchy look. I sized up from my normal medium to a large for an oversized look. Excited for the other color to arrive.
Very comfortable, thin material but perfect for cool summer days. Absolutely love!

I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of this sweatshirt.  The fabric is nice and soft, and the sleeve length and overall length is perfect for this tall girl.  It's oversized, but not too much.  I love the color combination and will wear it often over the summer.  For reference, I am 5'10"; 145 lbs and ordered a small.
I love the shirt but it said pink and it’s clearly orange. It does not match the skirt I bought to go with it so that was disappointing.
i love this sweatshirt so much! it is identical to the free people one! the material is amazing and i have been wearing it the past few days!

Wanted to love this but it's an awkward fit! I am 5'9.5" and 151lbs. Got the medium which is already oversized. The sleeves are wayyy too short and the shoulders are huge and boxy. Didn't like the fit at all and the material was just ok. The colors are gorgeous though. Maybe if you're a more petite frame try it out in your normal size.

This is a boxy, shorter body style with average length sleeves.  All photos of this on the site show a longer hip length fit - ordering my normal size it comes just below the waist - think middle of hip/top of jean pocket.  Very disappointing.  Also, the inside is a french terry which is not soft.  Will be returning.  The color is pretty though.
Great fit. I was very surprised at how well this fit! Not too big, I ordered a size 3XL. Stretchy material. Great quality. Colors look great.

Oversized, but soft and comfortable pullover shirt. I liked the blue and yellow combo for summer. It still gets cool at night so it's nice to have something warm and long sleeved to pop on. It washes well and hung to dry. I did not put it in the dryer. Zero shrinkage or wrinkles.

评论概述: I could live in this sweatshirt
评论详情: Awesome oversized fit.  I’m 5’1, 122lbs and bought a small.  Soft but warm, cute with shorts or jeans.
I sized down so it wouldn't be soooo very large on - but the sleeves are not nearly long enough for the effect shown in the product image.

Kinda weird material and giant but it's totally cute and comfy and looks good with denim shorts and knee socks in the evening time when it cools off a bit and you're out and about. The colors are bright and it went through the wash without fading.

评论概述: Better Than Expected - Stripes Matched Along Seams Even!
评论详情: The material is heavier and better quality than I anticipated. Also, I was shocked when all of the stripes were perfectly matched along both side seams. Usually for an item in this price range the stripes will not match and it can make something look so sloppy. For a sweatshirt it looks pretty polished. It looks more expensive than it is and I am very pleased with this purchase.

评论概述: Super cute- size up if you truly want an oversized fit
评论详情: Love the design of the sweatshirt, the neon pops, perfect color scheme for right now. I would like to actually wear it right now, but because the fabric is actually heavy enough to qualify as a sweatshirt it will have to wait until the muggy midwest summer dies down. I am 5'6/36D and usually wear a size 6....I wanted oversized but I have ordered for that with previous tops and ended up swimming in them. I ordered a small, and while the body is still oversized, the sleeves are actually a touch on the shorter/too short side. To get the fit of the pictured model I think a medium would have done it. Overall, though, super cute, can't wait to wear in the fall, definitely recommend!

Color the color combinations on this shirt.  The burgundy color and navy blues compliments each other, the contrasting cuffs draw your eyes to the design of the shirt itself.  The wide sleeves are unusual as well. Thus long sleeve shirt fits true to size. We have washed it once and have no issue with shrinkage.

This oversized sweatshirt is so nice, the fabric is soft, it falls beautiful and fits great, truly oversized for that comfy slouch look!  I got the pink/blue and couldn’t be happier, the colors are so vibrant, washes up perfectly!

This is oversized and really cute looking.  I got the burgundy and navy striped shirt for my niece.  The color looks great and will hopefully hold up to many washings.  It is mostly cotton which makes it cooler, with a small bit of polyester to make it durable when wearing and washings.The only issue is the texture on the inside of the shirt.  My niece is super sensitive to textures and the individual lines are pronounced on the inside of the shirt.
Nice oversized sweatshirt. I like that it’s not fleece inside, but still feels warm and soft.

This brings me back to my childhood in the early 90s. I love the cut, the style, and the colors and it's a good weight for those cooler spring and summer nights. The colors are true to what's advertised and fit is true to size.

I love this colorful sweatshirt. It's easy to throw on when things get chilly and it's very stylish. The material is comfortable and the colors are fantastic. I will get this in multiple colors.  Fits true to size.
Just something my wife saw and got.  She is very happy with it all the way around.

评论用户: Just A Girl That Loves Her Dogs
评论详情: It is oversized and super comfy. I normally wear a large but ordered a medium and I am glad I did. It fits perfectly while still being a little oversized. This is that perfect sweatshirt that you never want to take off. Very cheerful colors. Excellent quality material. I am very pleased and highly recommend it.

The pink and green coloring in this is SO cute! I'm 5'x7", 185#, curvy and the Large fit oversized but if you want a VERY oversized fit, I might size up 2x. Just depending on how you big you want your crewneck.

I wear a medium. I’m 5’ 138 lbs and I typically size up to a large because I like a loose fit. However with this sweatshirt I would advise that you order your size. A large was way too much for my frame. I think the medium would have given me the added room that I wanted, and a small would have been the perfect fit. With that said, I do still like the shirt a lot. It’s a rather a lightweight sweatshirt that can be worn on a spring/fall day or evening. I ordered the blue/white, but fair warning, the blue stripes appear more gray to me than blue. The yellow is a nice bright canary yellow and the white is actually a bright white. Overall I’m pleased with this sweatshirt and would order again.

This is a nice top.  It fits true to size and goes well with jeans or a pair of dress slacks.  The material is soft and has a good quality feel to it and the color is very pretty.  It's a good price for the quality.

I ordered the Kissfix Women's Striped Oversized Sweatshirt Long Sleeve Shirts for Women Crewneck Hoodies Casual Pullover Top Y2K Tops in the pink and green. This is an oversized, mostly cotton, well made shirt that feels comfortable the first wear due to the oversized style and fit. Honestly, I wasn’t sure what to expect when I ordered it… now, I couldn’t be more pleased. The colors are bright and cheery and ones that you’d never think of putting together in an outfit- they did… and it works! It’s super stylish in the pink and green alternating stripes with the neon yellow cuffs around the sleeves and neck adding drama as if the stripes colors isn’t enough to grab people’s attention!😂 The addition of the neon yellow collar and cuffs certainly ensures you’ll be noticed and seen! I wore this with a pair of jean shorts and it looked cute and contemporary . It looks just as great with jeans or leggings. It’s 75% cotton so it’s very soft and feels nice against my skin.  The added breathability that cotton offers makes it feel extremely soft. I love it so much I’m ordering another one right now! Definitely a great buy of a quality made, contemporary color & style shirt! I’ll be able to wear it  just about anywhere, anytime in any weather… talk about versatility!

I got the black/white stripe as shown in the pic. I am normally a med and ordered a small since it's oversized and glad I did. It still fits big but doesn't drown me. The colors are vibrant and the fabric is comfortable. Very cute.
